FuncDef: The startup feature-software command configures feature packages for the next startup in batches. The startup feature-software command configures feature packages for the next startup in batches. By default, feature packages for next startup are specified in batches or separately.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifying feature software.
The value is a string of 5 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: In a feature software upgrade or downgrade scenario, you can run this command to configure the feature package for the next startup in batches.
